companyInfo.Competitors: Palo Alto Staffing, Artech Information Systems, TEKsystems

jobDescription: Job Description Akraya is looking for a Sr. Business Data Analyst for one of our clients. If the job description below is a fit, please apply directly or call Abhishek @408-907-3201.  If this position is not quite what you're looking for, visit akraya.com and submit a copy of your resume. Our recruiters will get to work finding you a job that is a better match at one of our many clients.  Primary Skills: Strong SQL, Tableau, Omniture, strong database skills  Duration: 12+ Months  Contract Type: W2 Only Qualifications:5+ experience in web analytics decision support and website optimization for online/ecommerce businessesMust have expertise with SQLMust have experience with TableauMust have experience with Relational Database Vertica is preferred but any others will sufficeOmniture Site Catalyst Understanding of complex web ecosystems, best practices, and ability to put this knowledge into action Please apply directly with updated resume or call Abhishek @ 408-907-3201  About Akraya  Akraya, Inc. is an award-winning staffing firm that works with many of the leading, technology-based companies around the world. We have been ranked as one of the "Best Staffing Firms to Temp for" by Staffing Industry Analysts on multiple occasions and are a preferred staffing vendor within numerous staffing programs. Please visit akraya.com to search through all of our current openings or to submit your resume to our recruiting team.
